author: Whitney Jefferson
title: 13 Things Justin Bieber Has Been Up To In 2017
text:

CPR/FAMEFLYNET PICTURES ID: 10586371 …with Tweety Bird and the Tasmanian Devil on it. View this image ›
Cpr / CPR/FAMEFLYNET PICTURES ID: 10586424 9. He’s wearing glasses and black boots. View this image ›
Stoianov / Stoianov/FAMEFLYNET PICTURES ID: 10586377 10. He’s sticking his tongue out on stage. View this image ›
Grby / The Grosby Group / AKM-GSI ID: 10587246 11. He’s playing in the NHL All-Star shootout. View this image ›
Sean M. Haffey / Getty Images ID: 10586382 (He’s Canadian, remember?) View this image ›
Sean M. Haffey / Getty Images ID: 10586384 12. He’s giving us “Stan” realness while dribbling a basketball…. View this image ›
Rocstar/FAMEFLYNET PICTURES ID: 10586375 …and the saddest peace sign ever. View this image ›
Rocstar / Rocstar/FAMEFLYNET PICTURES ID: 10586374 13. And finally, he’s peeing his pants. Loading View on Instagram
